All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BackgroundApp
A background application that is started before the foreground app and can communicate with the foreground app.
BaseFxmlForegroundApp
FxForegroundApp with constructor that expects a FxmlLoaderFactory
BrowserService
Interface that abstracts JavaFX HostServices.showDocument()} Use this interface to controllers/services that wish to tell a browser to open a window.
DefaultFxMainView
Default, Internal implementation of FxForegroundApp.FxMainView.
ForegroundApp
An abstraction of a User Interface application that is separated into a foreground app and a background app.
ForegroundApp.SupernautMainView
Marker interface for Main View.
ForegroundApp.SupernautView
Marker interface for a view.
FxBrowserService
Implementation of BrowserService using JavaFX HostServices.
FxForegroundApp
Supernaut.FX applications must implement this interface.
FxForegroundApp.FxApplicationCompat
This interface makes converting from an instance of Application easier.
FxForegroundApp.FxMainView
A OpenJFX-compatible ForegroundApp.SupernautMainView that potentially contains a Stage.
FxForegroundApp.OpenJfxApplicationAware
Implement this interface if you need access to the Application object instance
FxLauncher
Launcher for Supernaut.FX (JavaFX) applications.
FxLauncherAbstract
Base JavaFX implementation of FxLauncher.
FxLauncherAbstract.AppFactory
Interface that can be used to create and pre-initialize ForegroundApp and BackgroundApp.
FxLauncherAbstract.DefaultAppFactory
Default implementation of AppFactory.
FxmlLoaderFactory
Factory interface for providing DI-enabled instances of FXMLLoader
JavaLoggingSupport
GraalVM-compatible Support for using Java Logging See: https://github.com/oracle/graal/blob/master/substratevm/LOGGING.md The default log-level for command-line tools configured in logging.properties should be `WARNING`.
Launcher
Improved, asynchronous two-phase application launcher.
MicronautContextAware
TODO: Use this somewhere to inject the context
MicronautFxLauncher
A launcher that uses Micronaut@ framework to instantiate and Dependency Inject the foreground and background applications.
MicronautFxLauncher.MicronautAppFactory
Implement of AppFactory using either a Micronaut BeanContext or ApplicationContext
MicronautFxmlLoaderFactory
Factory for providing FXMLLoaders that do full DI.
NoopBackgroundApp
A Noop background app for testing
NoopFxForegroundApp
No-op ForegroundApp which exits immediately (used for testing)
OpenJfxProxyApplication
Internal Supernaut.fx implementation of Application.
SimpleFxLauncher
A simple FxLauncherAbstract that uses Class objects to specify BackgroundApp and FxForegroundApp.
TimingMeasurements
Simple class for recording timestamps for benchmarking
